      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.lang.String sceneFilename,
              int canvasWidth,
              int canvasHeight,
              java.lang.String aboutMessage)
        Should be called after construction. Sets default scene file, canvas size and about message
        Parameters:
        sceneFilename - Filename of the scene to automatically load on startup
        canvasWidth - Width of the rendered image
        canvasHeight - Height of the rendered image
        aboutMessage - Message to appear at the about dialog
